name: Introduction to Programming
summary: Learn the basics of programming.
description: This course covers fundamental concepts like variables, control structures, and functions.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
summary: Explore essential data structures and algorithms.
description: Learn about arrays, linked lists, sorting algorithms, and more.

name: Web Development Bootcamp
summary: Become a full-stack developer in this intensive bootcamp.
description: Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and React.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
summary: Discover the basics of machine learning.
description: Cover supervised and unsupervised learning, regression, and classification.

name: iOS App Development
summary: Learn to build iOS apps with Swift.
description: Create engaging apps for iPhone and iPad.

name: JavaScript Essentials
summary: Master the basics of JavaScript programming.
description: Learn about variables, functions, loops, and more.

name: Python for Data Science
summary: Learn Python programming for data analysis.
description: Cover data manipulation, visualization, and machine learning with Python libraries.

name: Ethical Hacking Basics
summary: Discover the fundamentals of ethical hacking.
description: Understand penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and network security.

name: Graphic Design Fundamentals
summary: Learn the basics of graphic design principles.
description: Cover topics like typography, color theory, and layout design.

name: React Native Development
summary: Build cross-platform mobile apps with React Native.
description: Create native-quality apps for iOS and Android using React and JavaScript.

name: Digital Marketing Essentials
summary: Master the basics of digital marketing strategies.
description: Cover SEO, SEM, social media marketing, email marketing, and more.

name: UI/UX Design Principles
summary: Explore user interface and user experience design concepts.
description: Learn about user research, wireframing, prototyping, and usability testing.

name: Java Programming Basics
summary: Learn the fundamentals of Java programming language.
description: Cover object-oriented programming, inheritance, polymorphism, and more.

name: WordPress Website Development
summary: Build professional websites using WordPress CMS.
description: Create custom themes and plugins, and learn about website deployment and management.

name: SQL Fundamentals
summary: Learn SQL basics for database management.
description: Cover SQL queries, database design, and data manipulation techniques.

name: Game Development with Unity
summary: Create games with Unity game engine.
description: Build 2D and 3D games for various platforms like PC, mobile, and consoles.

name: Angular Framework Basics
summary: Get started with Angular framework.
description: Learn about components, services, directives, and more.

name: Cybersecurity Fundamentals
summary: Understand the basics of cybersecurity principles.
description: Cover network security, cryptography, and common security threats.

name: Artificial Intelligence Basics
summary: Learn the fundamentals of artificial intelligence.
description: Cover machine learning, neural networks, and natural language processing.

name: Email Marketing Essentials
summary: Master the essentials of email marketing.
description: Learn about email campaign creation, segmentation, and analytics.

name: Advanced Machine Learning
summary: Dive deep into advanced machine learning techniques.
description: Explore topics like deep learning, reinforcement learning, and natural language processing.

name: Advanced Web Security
summary: Master advanced concepts in web security.
description: Learn about web application vulnerabilities, secure coding practices, and security testing methodologies.

name: Expert React Development
summary: Become an expert in React development.
description: Cover advanced topics like performance optimization, state management, and server-side rendering.

name: Advanced Data Visualization
summary: Learn advanced techniques for data visualization.
description: Explore tools like D3.js and Plotly for creating interactive and dynamic visualizations.

name: Expert Python Programming
summary: Master advanced Python programming techniques.
description: Cover topics like metaprogramming, decorators, and concurrency in Python.
